manifestDescription.message: Add full URL or hostname of the current page to the window title. Helps other apps, e.g., KeePass, identify current page.

optionsSectionHeader.description: In extension options, the main header

optionsShowFullUrlHeader.message: How to display URL in Window Title?
optionsShowFullUrlHeader.description: In extension options, header for showFullUrl setting

optionsShowFullUrlText.description: In extension options, text next to checkbox for showFullUrl setting

optionsShowFullUrlHelp.message: Checked shows the full URL; Unchecked shows only the hostname portion.
optionsShowFullUrlHelp.description: In extension options, helper text for showFullUrl setting

optionsSeparatorStringHeader.description: In extension options, header for separatorString setting

optionsSeparatorStringHelp.message: A string to be put between the original title and the URL (e.g., 'Title - URL' or 'Title :: URL')
optionsSeparatorStringHelp.description: In extension options, helper text for separatorString setting

optionsShowFieldAttributesHeader.description: In extension options, header for showFieldAttributes setting

optionsShowFieldAttributesText.message: Show the field attributes when a text input field has focus?
optionsShowFieldAttributesText.description: In extension options, text next to checkbox for showFieldAttributes setting

optionsShowFieldAttributesHelp.message: When this is checked, the 'name' and 'id' attributes of <input /> fields will be added to the title when they have focus. This is useful if you have a page where the URL is not enough for Keepass to determine the proper auto-type. This is good for two-step logons as well. You simply create an auto-type command specific to the field, then you can determine the auto-type based on the URL and the specific field which currently has fous.
optionsShowFieldAttributesHelp.description: In extension options, helper text for showFieldAttributes setting

optionsSaveButtonText.description: In Options Popup - Text which is shown on the save button

optionsSavedHeader.description: In Options Popup - Header for green div that is shown after clicking save button, to confirm saving happened

optionsSavedMessage.message: You may need to reload/refresh your tabs.
optionsSavedMessage.description: In Options Popup - Text that is shown after clicking save button, to confirm saving happened

optionsDonateLinkText.description: In Options Popup - Link that leads to donation page

optionsHelpLinkText.description: In Options Popup - Link that leads to help page
